text: Keith Sonnier (July 31, 1941 – July 18, 2020)Keith Sonnier has died, Artnet was an American postminimalist sculptor, performance artist, video and light artist. Sonnier was one of the first artists to use light in sculpture in the 1960s. Sonnier was a part of the Process Art movement. He was born in Mamou, Louisiana. Sonnier died in Southampton, New York, on 18 July 2020 from colon cancer at the age of 78.Sculptor Keith Sonnier, America’s Experimental Poet of Light and Neon, Has Died at Age 78 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:American sculptors Category:Artists from New York (state) Category:People from Louisiana
title: Keith Sonnier
